subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: J. P. Arencibia had four hits and two home runs in his first major league game in 2010 then went 1 for 30. As spring training begins, his future is now.
snippet: J. P. Arencibia had four hits and two home runs in his first major league game in 2010 then went 1 for 30. As spring training begins, his future is now.
